title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 4.1 - General statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 4.1 - General statement

State Regulations

The Superintendent of Banks is prepared to authorize public
accommodation offices for commercial banks, savings banks and savings and loan
associations, subject to the requirements of article IV- A of the Banking Law
and provided that, unsound or destructive competition would not result, and
there is a reasonable likelihood of success for the proposed
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
